tasks.compile:all: deno task compile:linux && deno task compile:macos && deno task compile:windows
tasks.compile:linux: deno compile -A --import-map import_map.json --target x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu --output dist/noti-linux src/main.ts
tasks.compile:macos: deno compile -A --import-map import_map.json --target x86_64-apple-darwin --output dist/noti-macos src/main.ts
tasks.compile:windows: deno compile -A --import-map import_map.json --target x86_64-pc-windows-msvc --output dist/noti-windows.exe src/main.ts
tasks.install: deno install --global -A -f -n noti --config deno.json --import-map import_map.json src/main.ts
